title: Bagels and Beans - Piet Heinplein
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain of lunchrooms, this branch is situated opposite to the Koninglijke Stallen (Royal stables). Offers some vegetarian and vegan bagels, plus sweets, coffee with soymilk option, fresh juices. Uses some fair-trade and organic ingredients. Free Wi-Fi.
